Body:
setRoles(self.portal, TEST_USER_ID, ['Contributor'])
obj = api.content.create(container=self.portal, type='Newsletter', id=
    'newsletter')
self.assertTrue(INewsletter.providedBy(obj),
    u'INewsletter not provided by {0}!'.format(obj.id))
parent = obj.__parent__
self.assertIn('newsletter', parent.objectIds())
api.content.delete(obj=obj)
self.assertNotIn('newsletter', parent.objectIds())
